title: Review
description: JSON Schema for Review data structures

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the JSON file describing the film

filmId.description: unique identifier of the film for which a review invitation has been issued

reviewerId.description: unique identifier of the the user who has received the review invitation

completed.description: this property is set to true if the review has been completed, false otherwise

reviewDate.description: the date when the review has been completed by the invited user

rating.description: the rating the reviewer has given to the film

review.description: a textual description of the review
